description: Looking for healthier dinner ideas for the kids? Try this yummy, crunchy fish fingers recipe with tasty green mushy peas.
name: Fish Fingers With Mushy Peas Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g firm white fish fillets, cut into 3cmwide strips
1 punnet dill, sprigs picked, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 240°C/220°C fanforced. Line a baking tray with baking paper.

Place flour and breadcrumbs on separate plates, and egg in a shallow bowl. Working with 1 piece of fish at a time, coat both sides in flour, dip in egg, then coat in breadcrumbs. Place on tray and spray with oil. Bake for 14 minutes, turning halfway, or until golden and cooked through.

Meanwhile, place peas in a microwavesafe bowl. Microwave on high for 3 minutes or until heated through. Using back of a fork, coarsely mash peas. Stir in half each of the zest and dill. Season with pepper.
Combine yoghurt, mustard, cucumber, and remaining zest and dill in a small bowl. Season with pepper. Serve fish with peas, yoghurt tartare, leafy mix and lemonwedges.
